name: Broken Vessels Demo
description:
Broken Vessels

In the dark world full of treachery and menacingly looking pixels, you control a small mage with eldritch powers to defeat the evil lurking below

Demo - game is not finished and bugs may appear, if so, please report them, and don't be afraid to leave some comment and opinion on the game below

Cover Art by my friend Amber on Twitter: https://twitter.com/amberfoxtrot?lang=en
